original: 千眼千臂觀世音菩薩陀羅尼神
analyzed: 千眼千臂觀世音菩薩陀羅尼神
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Thousand-Eyed and Thousand-Armed Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva
Thousand-eyed and Thousand-armed Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva Dhāraṇī Divine Spell Sūtra, Scroll 2

original: 大唐總持寺沙門智通譯
analyzed: 大唐總持寺沙門智通譯
translated: Translated by Śramaṇa Zhitong of Zōjiji in the Great Tang
At that time, Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva

original: 說是呪時三千大千世界。
analyzed: 說是呪時三千大千世界。
translated: When this spell was spoken, the trichiliocosm

original: 乃至非想非非想天六反震動。
analyzed: 乃至非想非非想天六反震動。
translated: Up to the heaven of neither perception nor non-perception shook six times.

original: 色究竟天魔醯首羅不安其處皆大恐懼。
analyzed: 色究竟天魔醯首羅不安其處皆大恐懼。
translated: In the heaven of the ultimate form, Maheśvara was uneasy in his place and was greatly frightened.

original: 一切惡鬼皆大叫喚受大苦惱。
analyzed: 一切惡鬼皆大叫喚受大苦惱。
translated: All evil ghosts all greatly wailed and suffered greatly.
They ran away in all directions, not knowing where to go.

original: 爾時化身語諸大眾及諸惡鬼神等。
analyzed: 爾時化身語諸大眾及諸惡鬼神等。
translated: At that time, the transformed body said to the great assembly and all the evil ghosts and spirits:

original: 若不隨順我呪者違逆者。
analyzed: 若不隨順我呪者違逆者。
translated: If you do not follow my spell and go against it,
Your head will be smashed to pieces.

original: 此呪能摧破諸山乾竭大海。
analyzed: 此呪能摧破諸山乾竭大海。
translated: This spell can destroy all mountains and dry up the great ocean.

original: 此呪能摧阿修羅軍護諸國土。
analyzed: 此呪能摧阿修羅軍護諸國土。
translated: This spell can destroy the asura army and protect all countries.

original: 此呪能摧伏一切諸惡鬼神。
analyzed: 此呪能摧伏一切諸惡鬼神。
translated: This spell can subdue all evil ghosts and spirits.
All the stars and all evil poisons.
All illnesses and all evil people.

original: 此呪能摧破三十三天皆令降伏。
analyzed: 此呪能摧破三十三天皆令降伏。
translated: This mantra can crush and subdue the thirty-three heavens.
If there is a good man.
Who is able to recite and uphold this mantra.
The power of that person is indescribable.

original: 此呪能令誦持之者豪貴自在。
analyzed: 此呪能令誦持之者豪貴自在。
translated: This mantra can make the reciter wealthy and self-sufficient.
It can also make the king love and cherish him for his whole life.
Whatever he wishes for will be fulfilled.
If one wishes to subdue demonic enemies.

original: 當燒分求羅香誦我身呪二十一遍。
analyzed: 當燒分求羅香誦我身呪二十一遍。
translated: One should burn bhurjja incense and recite my mantra twenty-one times.
If one wishes to make all people love oneself.
One should enchant willow branches twenty-one times.
Chew on them in the mouth and one will obtain love and respect.

original: 若欲令自身辯才智慧者。
analyzed: 若欲令自身辯才智慧者。
translated: If one wishes to have eloquence and wisdom for oneself.
One should enchant changpu (a type of plant) one thousand and eight times.

original: 塗其心上即得辯才無礙。
analyzed: 塗其心上即得辯才無礙。
translated: Anoint the heart with it and one will obtain unobstructed eloquence.
Make the mudra of the heart mantra of the Mother Dhāraṇī.

original: 13 辯才無礙印千眼千臂觀世音菩薩辯才無礙印第十三以兩手相背合掌。
analyzed: 13 辯才無礙印千眼千臂觀世音菩薩辯才無礙印第十三以兩手相背合掌。
translated: 13. The Mudrā of Unimpeded Eloquence, the Thousand-Eyed and Thousand-Armed Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva's Mudrā of Unimpeded Eloquence, the thirteenth. Join the two hands back to back in añjali.
Extend the thumbs forward.
This mudrā can protect oneself and others.
One should establish a boundary wherever one goes.

original: 或呪淨水或呪淨灰各呪七遍。
analyzed: 或呪淨水或呪淨灰各呪七遍。
translated: Either consecrate water or consecrate ash, each with seven recitations of the mantra.

original: 所在住處以手掬水掬灰先灑自身。
analyzed: 所在住處以手掬水掬灰先灑自身。
translated: In the place where one resides, scoop up water with one's hands and scoop up ash, first sprinkling oneself.

original: 然後向於四方四角如法散灑。
analyzed: 然後向於四方四角如法散灑。
translated: Then, in the four directions and four corners, scatter it in accordance with the Dharma.
If there are good men and good women,

original: 被諸惡鬼眾邪魍魎之所或亂者。
analyzed: 被諸惡鬼眾邪魍魎之所或亂者。
translated: who are disturbed by various evil ghosts and evil spirits,
Take a pomegranate branch and a willow branch.

original: 陰誦此呪輕打病人無病不差。
analyzed: 陰誦此呪輕打病人無病不差。
translated: Recite this mantra silently and lightly strike the patient. No illness will not be cured.
The mantra states:

original: 南無薩婆勃陀達摩僧祇比耶二合南無阿利耶婆盧吉低攝伐羅寫菩提薩多波寫南無拔折羅二合波尼寫菩提薩多波寫跢姪他徒比徒比迦耶徒比娑羅闍婆羅尼馺皤二合訶此呪印能降伏諸邪見外道。
analyzed: 南無薩婆勃陀達摩僧祇比耶二合南無阿利耶婆盧吉低攝伐羅寫菩提薩多波寫南無拔折羅二合波尼寫菩提薩多波寫跢姪他徒比徒比迦耶徒比娑羅闍婆羅尼馺皤二合訶此呪印能降伏諸邪見外道。
translated: Namo sarva buddhâdharma-sangha-bhyaḥ Namo 'ryâvalokiteśvarāya Bodhisattvāya Namo vajra-pāṇaye Bodhisattvāya Tadyathâ tu tu tu tu kāya tu tu śaraṇa-yâva-ni
If there are good men and good women,
In the three periods of morning, noon, and dusk,
Reciting once in each period,

original: 即與種種供養十億諸佛無有異也。
analyzed: 即與種種供養十億諸佛無有異也。
translated: It is no different from making various offerings to ten koṭis of Buddhas.
They will forever be free from a female body.
After death, they will forever leave the three evil paths,
And will attain rebirth in the land of Amitâbha Buddha.
The Tathâgata will extend his hand to pat their heads,
Saying, Do not be afraid. Come and be born in my land.
In their present life, they will not suffer untimely death,
And will not be taken advantage of by ghosts and spirits.

original: 14 菩薩破大千世界滅罪印菩薩破大千世界滅罪印第十四起立以左手向前展臂。
analyzed: 14 菩薩破大千世界滅罪印菩薩破大千世界滅罪印第十四起立以左手向前展臂。
translated: 14. The Bodhisattva's Mudrā for Destroying the Great Chiliocosm and Eliminating Sins The Bodhisattva's Mudrā for Destroying the Great Chiliocosm and Eliminating Sins, Fourteenth: Stand up, extend the left arm forward,
Spread the five fingers forward, and stand the five fingers up.

original: 次以右手大母指屈在掌中。
analyzed: 次以右手大母指屈在掌中。
translated: Next, bend the thumb of the right hand in the palm,
And clench the four fingers into a fist above the right ear.
Recite the body mantra while moving the index finger.
This mudrā should be performed three times a day,
Reciting seven times each time.
It can eliminate the sins of the five heinous crimes and the four grave offenses.
Give rise to a compassionate mind towards all sentient beings.
It can then burn away all the roots of sin.
After this body perishes, one will be able to meet the Buddha.

original: 於彼佛土得作轉輪聖王。
analyzed: 於彼佛土得作轉輪聖王。
translated: In that buddha land, one will become a wheel-turning sage king.

original: 復得陀羅尼名曰無量無盡藏。
analyzed: 復得陀羅尼名曰無量無盡藏。
translated: One will also attain a dhāraṇī called the Inexhaustible Treasury of Immeasurable [Merit].
One will also attain samādhi called Wisdom Equality.
One will also attain twenty-eight kinds of marks on the body.

original: 現身不患眼舌耳鼻等痛。
analyzed: 現身不患眼舌耳鼻等痛。
translated: In this life, one will not suffer from pain in the eyes, tongue, ears, nose, and so forth.

original: 乃至身中一切疾病悉能消滅。
analyzed: 乃至身中一切疾病悉能消滅。
translated: All illnesses in the body will be completely eliminated.

original: 若有先業罪者亦得消滅。
analyzed: 若有先業罪者亦得消滅。
translated: If one has previously committed offenses, they will also be eliminated.

original: 若見天旱時。🔽取烏麻子和稗麻子脂。
analyzed: 若見天旱時。 取烏麻子和稗麻子脂。
translated: If one sees a drought,🔽Take sesame seeds and panic grass seeds,
Make them into pills, and recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.
Throw them into a deep pool of water, and it will rain.

original: 若雨過多。🔽取稻穀燒作灰。
analyzed: 若雨過多。 取稻穀燒作灰。
translated: If the rain is too much,🔽Take burned rice grains,
Take rape seed oil and make them into pills.
Recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.
Throw them into a deep pool of water, and the rain will stop.

original: 15 菩薩降伏三千大千世界魔怨印菩薩降伏三千大千世界魔怨印第十五以五指相叉。
analyzed: 15 菩薩降伏三千大千世界魔怨印菩薩降伏三千大千世界魔怨印第十五以五指相叉。
translated: The mudra for subduing the enemies of the Three Thousand Great Thousand Worlds, the mudra for subduing the enemies of the Three Thousand Great Thousand Worlds, the fifteenth, interlace the five fingers,
with the left pressing on the right, tightly clenched into a fist.
Place it on top of the head.
Recite the body mantra and you will be able to subdue [enemies].

original: 若作此法向舍利塔前二十九日夜。
analyzed: 若作此法向舍利塔前二十九日夜。
translated: If you perform this method in front of a stūpa containing relics for twenty-nine nights,
Take white sandalwood and make it into powder.
Anoint the ground and make a maṇḍala.
Scatter various flowers in it.
Bathe and purify oneself, put on new clean clothes.
Hold an incense burner in one's hand and burn agarwood incense.
Face east and sit, recite the mantra 1,080 times.
This is the initial function.
Also take black mustard seeds and black sesame seeds.
Put them together and grind them into powder.
Take a small amount with three fingers.
Recite the mantra once and throw it into the fire.

original: 如是七日日別一百八遍。
analyzed: 如是七日日別一百八遍。
translated: In this way, for seven days, recite 108 times each day.
Then whatever is done will all be accomplished.

original: 16 菩薩廣大無畏印菩薩廣大無畏印第十六起立並足。
analyzed: 16 菩薩廣大無畏印菩薩廣大無畏印第十六起立並足。
translated: Bodhisattva's Vast and Fearless Seal, Part 16 Stand up with feet together.
First, with the right hand, support the left elbow.
The left hand is also like that.
In front of the relic image.
Recite the body mantra 108 times.
One will then attain fearlessness and bestow it upon sentient beings.

original: 又取茴香白芥子昌蒲捨多婆利外國藥名以此等物。
analyzed: 又取茴香白芥子昌蒲捨多婆利外國藥名以此等物。
translated: Also take fennel, white mustard seeds, and changpu (a kind of herb), and use these things.
Burn it in the inner fire.

original: 燒火之時應於佛前或在淨處。
analyzed: 燒火之時應於佛前或在淨處。
translated: When burning the fire, you should be in front of the Buddha or in a pure place.
Recite the mantra thirty-two times.
Make offerings with incense and flowers.
The mantra method will all be accomplished.
Whatever you do will all be successful.
If other mantras are ineffective.
Reciting this mantra will also be accomplished.
If you want to ask for a dream.
Recite this mantra and make a mudra to seal your eyes.

original: 即有夢隨所欲見皆得見之。
analyzed: 即有夢隨所欲見皆得見之。
translated: Then you will have a dream and will see whatever you want to see.
If a person has no blessings and is unsuccessful in whatever they do.
Recite this mantra three times a day for seven days.
Whatever they seek will all be accomplished.

original: 爾時菩薩在娑竭羅龍宮海會說法。
analyzed: 爾時菩薩在娑竭羅龍宮海會說法。
translated: At that time, the Bodhisattva was in the ocean assembly of the palace of the nāga king Sāgara expounding the Dharma.
He saw the multitudes of nāgas suffering from great afflictions.

original: 愍諸龍眾為度苦惱眾生。
analyzed: 愍諸龍眾為度苦惱眾生。
translated: He had compassion for the multitudes of nāgas and in order to liberate suffering beings.
They all became free from suffering and had no enemies or harm.
At that time, the nāga maiden offered a precious pearl.
Worth the entire Sahā world.

original: 為求法故吾為廣說離諸苦難。
analyzed: 為求法故吾為廣說離諸苦難。
translated: In order to seek the Dharma, I will extensively explain for you the means to escape from suffering and difficulties.
At that time, the Bodhisattva Water Crystal,
in order to benefit and protect those who uphold this mantra,
recited the mantra, saying:

original: 17 水精菩薩護持千眼印咒水精菩薩護持千眼印呪第十七毘摩隷摩訶毘摩隷郁呵隸摩訶郁呵隸休摩隷摩訶休摩隷薩訶隷止隷涕馺婆訶若有善男子善女人。
analyzed: 17 水精菩薩護持千眼印咒水精菩薩護持千眼印呪第十七毘摩隷摩訶毘摩隷郁呵隸摩訶郁呵隸休摩隷摩訶休摩隷薩訶隷止隷涕馺婆訶若有善男子善女人。
translated: The mantra for the Bodhisattva Water Crystal to uphold the seal of the thousand eyes, the seventeenth. Vimalai Mahā-vimalai Ukkhalai Mahā-ukkhalahi Umahalahi Mahā-umahalhi Sahala Sthali Svaha If there are good men and good women,

original: 在所遊方受持此千眼千臂菩薩法者。
analyzed: 在所遊方受持此千眼千臂菩薩法者。
translated: who travel everywhere upholding the Dharma of the Bodhisattva with a thousand eyes and a thousand arms,
I will always follow and protect them.

original: 乃至諸魔眷屬無惱亂者。
analyzed: 乃至諸魔眷屬無惱亂者。
translated: Even the demons and their retinue will not disturb them.

original: 若人急難他國相侵盜賊逆亂。
analyzed: 若人急難他國相侵盜賊逆亂。
translated: If people are in urgent difficulties, if other countries invade, if there are rebellions and uprisings,
one should use five-colored thread,
recite the mantra twenty-one times,
reciting the mantra once for each knot, and tie it to the left arm.

original: 又以左手無名指中指頭指。
analyzed: 又以左手無名指中指頭指。
translated: Then, with the ring finger, middle finger, and index finger of the left hand,
Place the fist on top of the nail of the thumb.
Spread out the little finger.
Recite the mantra seven times in the direction of the thief.
They will all retreat and disperse, unable to cause harm.

original: 爾時菩薩在雪山中說法。
analyzed: 爾時菩薩在雪山中說法。
translated: At that time, the Bodhisattva was expounding the Dharma in the Snow Mountains.

original: 觀見夜叉羅剎國中人民。
analyzed: 觀見夜叉羅剎國中人民。
translated: He observed that in the countries of the Yakshas and Rakshasas, the people

original: 唯食眾生血肉無有善心。
analyzed: 唯食眾生血肉無有善心。
translated: only ate the blood and flesh of sentient beings, without any good thoughts.

original: 菩薩為欲利益方便教化。
analyzed: 菩薩為欲利益方便教化。
translated: The Bodhisattva, wishing to benefit them, skillfully taught and transformed them.
With his spiritual powers, he immediately arrived in that country.
He manifested a body with a thousand eyes and a thousand arms, subduing the demons.
He then formed the Mudra of the Accomplishment of the Ucchusma Dharani.
At that time, the Rakshasa King
came to where I was, seeking mercy and bowing his head.
I sealed him with the Mudra of Accomplishment.
He immediately attained the unsurpassed Way.

original: 18 菩薩成就印菩薩成就印第十八起立並足。
analyzed: 18 菩薩成就印菩薩成就印第十八起立並足。
translated: The Bodhisattva's Accomplishment Mudra, the Eighteenth. Stand up with feet together.
Join palms in front of the chest.
Cross the little fingers, with the left one pressing on the right.
Recite the body mantra twenty-one times.
All kinds of accomplishments can be attained.
If you wish to save sentient beings in the six realms from suffering and distress,

original: 當用輪印以十指頭各相拄。
analyzed: 當用輪印以十指頭各相拄。
translated: You should use the wheel mudra, with the tips of the ten fingers touching each other.
Open the wrists and open the palms, leaving them open.

original: 其十指間各相去一寸許。
analyzed: 其十指間各相去一寸許。
translated: The ten fingers should be about one inch apart from each other.

original: 即是菩薩在六道循還度諸苦難。
analyzed: 即是菩薩在六道循還度諸苦難。
translated: This is the bodhisattva's method of cycling through the six realms to deliver all from suffering and difficulty.

original: 以此印轉迴悉皆得離苦此印法拔吒那羅延長年師繞翻便即歸國并將所翻之本智通畢竟尋逐不得遇於一僧邊得梵本譯出在外無本。
analyzed: 以此印轉迴悉皆得離苦此印法拔吒那羅延長年師繞翻便即歸國并將所翻之本智通畢竟尋逐不得遇於一僧邊得梵本譯出在外無本。
translated: By turning this mudra, they will all be able to escape suffering. This mudra method was translated by Master Changyan of the Longxing era. He immediately returned to his country and brought the translated text. Zhi Tong searched for it in the end but could not find it. He encountered a monk who obtained the Sanskrit text and translated it outside, but there is no original text.

original: 19 菩薩成等正覺印菩薩成等正覺印第十九結加趺坐。
analyzed: 19 菩薩成等正覺印菩薩成等正覺印第十九結加趺坐。
translated: The mudra of the bodhisattva attaining perfect enlightenment, the nineteenth mudra. Form the mudra of sitting in full lotus position.
First, extend the five fingers of the left hand,
With the palm facing up on the left knee.
Next, extend the five fingers of the right hand,
With the palm facing down pressing on the right knee.
This is the same as the mudra of nirvana.
The buddhas of the past, present, and future,
All attain Buddhahood through this mudrā.
This mudrā can eliminate all karmic hindrances.

original: 若坐禪諸法不現前者。🔽當七日七夜於阿練若處。
analyzed: 若坐禪諸法不現前者。 當七日七夜於阿練若處。
translated: If one is sitting in meditation and the teachings do not manifest,
one should recite this dhāraṇī and practice this mudrā method for seven days and seven nights in a secluded place.

original: 至心念佛晝夜六時懺悔。
analyzed: 至心念佛晝夜六時懺悔。
translated: With utmost sincerity, repent in the six periods of the day and night while contemplating the Buddha.
One will then attain the manifestation of the teachings.

original: 及所得福無量無邊不可稱計。
analyzed: 及所得福無量無邊不可稱計。
translated: And the blessings one obtains are immeasurable, boundless, and incalculable.

original: 20 菩薩呼召三十三天印菩薩呼召三十三天印第二十先以左手四指把拳。
analyzed: 20 菩薩呼召三十三天印菩薩呼召三十三天印第二十先以左手四指把拳。
translated: The mudrā for summoning the thirty-three celestials of the bodhisattvas, the mudrā for summoning the thirty-three celestials of the bodhisattvas, the twentieth. First, make a fist with the four fingers of the left hand.

original: 次以右手握左手大母指。
analyzed: 次以右手握左手大母指。
translated: Next, grasp the thumb of the left hand with the right hand.
Also make a fist as if grasping.
Make the thumb of the left hand
appear from the tiger's mouth of the right hand.
Move the index finger of the right hand back and forth.
The mantra says:

original: 唵一俱智俱智二俱耶利三遮利遮利四遮梨隷五蘇婆二合訶六此陀羅尼印呪不可思議。
analyzed: 唵一俱智俱智二俱耶利三遮利遮利四遮梨隷五蘇婆二合訶六此陀羅尼印呪不可思議。
translated: Oṃ kujiti kujiti kujayari śāri śāri śārile subhā. This dhāraṇī and mudrā are inconceivable.

original: 若善男子善女人臨欲眠時。
analyzed: 若善男子善女人臨欲眠時。
translated: If a good man or good woman is about to sleep,
recite this mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: 心中所願於夢寐中悉得知見。
analyzed: 心中所願於夢寐中悉得知見。
translated: Whatever wishes are in the mind will all be known and seen in dreams.
If one can recite this mantra every day,

original: 亦能滅一切罪發菩提心。
analyzed: 亦能滅一切罪發菩提心。
translated: it can also eliminate all sins and arouse the mind of enlightenment.
That person's dreams in the dark night
will gradually increase and all will be auspicious.

original: 乃至夢見如來在菩提樹下受記成道。
analyzed: 乃至夢見如來在菩提樹下受記成道。
translated: Up to dreaming of the Tathāgata under the Bodhi tree receiving the prediction of attaining enlightenment.

original: 乃至釋梵諸天常來侍衛。
analyzed: 乃至釋梵諸天常來侍衛。
translated: Up to Śakra, Brahmā, and the various gods always coming to attend and guard.

original: 21 菩薩呼召天龍八部鬼神印菩薩呼召天龍八部鬼神印第二十一起立並足。🔽先以左手大母指屈在掌中。
analyzed: 21 菩薩呼召天龍八部鬼神印菩薩呼召天龍八部鬼神印第二十一起立並足。 先以左手大母指屈在掌中。
translated: The mudrā for summoning the eight groups of devas, nāgas, and spirits called by the Bodhisattva, the mudrā for summoning the eight groups of devas, nāgas, and spirits called by the Bodhisattva, the twenty-first. Stand with feet together,🔽first bend the thumb of the left hand in the palm,
and make a fist with the four fingers to place above the heart.
Next, use the right hand in the same way.
Place the right hand by the right ear.
Move the index finger back and forth.
The mantra says:

original: 南無尼乾陀一南無阿利闍波陀二馺婆訶三南無阿利闍羅馺婆訶四󰫎醯夷醯馺婆訶五此呪印若善男子善女人受持讀誦者。
analyzed: 南無尼乾陀一南無阿利闍波陀二馺婆訶三南無阿利闍羅馺婆訶四󰫎醯夷醯馺婆訶五此呪印若善男子善女人受持讀誦者。
translated: Namo Nigandha, Namo Alidzhapata, Savvaha, Namo Alidzharo Savvaha, Heiya Ihiya Savvaha. If good men and good women uphold and recite this mantra,
They will know their past seven lives.
Poisonous snakes dare not bite.
Poisonous substances will naturally be removed.
Swords cannot harm them, and kings cannot be angry with them.
They will never experience the suffering of hell for an eternal kalpa.
When reciting this mantra,
The twenty-eight classes of ghosts and spirits will come.
They will sit beside the reciter and listen to the mantra being recited.
If there are good men and good women,
Who are possessed by ghosts and spirits,
Use white thread to make a mantra rope.

original: 一遍一結如是四十九結。
analyzed: 一遍一結如是四十九結。
translated: Recite once and tie a knot, do this forty-nine times.
Tie it below the throat, and the illness will be cured.

original: 若國中災疫流行國人死亡多者。
analyzed: 若國中災疫流行國人死亡多者。
translated: If there is an epidemic in the country and many people die,

original: 當取國王園池中蓮花一百八莖。
analyzed: 當取國王園池中蓮花一百八莖。
translated: one should take one hundred and eight lotus flowers from the king's garden and pond.

original: 一花各呪一遍擲置火中。
analyzed: 一花各呪一遍擲置火中。
translated: Recite the mantra once for each flower and throw it into the fire.
Burn until it is completely consumed, and the epidemic will be eliminated.

original: 22 菩薩解脫印菩薩解脫印第二十二結加趺坐。
analyzed: 22 菩薩解脫印菩薩解脫印第二十二結加趺坐。
translated: Bodhisattva Liberation Mudrā, Bodhisattva Liberation Mudrā, Twenty-Second Sitting in full lotus position,
first use the middle finger of the left hand,
and touch the tip of the thumb with the tip of the middle finger,
with the palm facing upward.

original: 餘三指散舒置於左膝上。
analyzed: 餘三指散舒置於左膝上。
translated: The remaining three fingers are extended and placed on the left knee.
Next, use the right hand in the same way,
with the palm facing down and placed on the right knee.
Recite the body mantra twenty-one times.
All wishes will be fulfilled.
All suffering and distress will be completely liberated.
If good men and good women,
who have committed the ten evil deeds and the five heinous crimes,
are as numerous as the dust motes on the ground of Jambudvīpa,
with each dust mote representing one kalpa,
then the number of sins committed by this person is equal to that.

original: 應墮地獄歷劫受苦永無出期。
analyzed: 應墮地獄歷劫受苦永無出期。
translated: Will fall into hell and experience suffering for eons without ever escaping.
These good men and good women,
In front of the relics and images,

original: 白月十五日一日一夜不食。
analyzed: 白月十五日一日一夜不食。
translated: On the fifteenth day of the white half-month, fasting for a day and a night,

original: 結印誦呪誦滿一百八遍。
analyzed: 結印誦呪誦滿一百八遍。
translated: Forming the mudra and reciting the mantra, reciting it 108 times.
All the above-mentioned offenses will be completely eradicated.

original: 若不消滅者無有是處此印智通本上先無智通於源州逢一婆羅門僧有此梵本遇會勘之更有此印自得受持大有功効不可思議。
analyzed: 若不消滅者無有是處此印智通本上先無智通於源州逢一婆羅門僧有此梵本遇會勘之更有此印自得受持大有功効不可思議。
translated: If they are not eradicated, it is impossible. This mudra was originally not known to Zhi Tong, but when he met a Brahmin monk in Yuanzhou, he obtained this Sanskrit text and collated it. There is also this mudra that he himself received and upheld, which has great efficacy and is inconceivable.

original: 23 菩薩自在神足印菩薩自在神足印第二十三起立先以左手握左脚大母指如把拳。
analyzed: 23 菩薩自在神足印菩薩自在神足印第二十三起立先以左手握左脚大母指如把拳。
translated: Bodhisattva's Independent Spiritual Powers Mudra, Part 23. Standing up, first use the left hand to grasp the big toe of the left foot like a fist.

original: 次以右手握左手腕背上。
analyzed: 次以右手握左手腕背上。
translated: Next, use the right hand to grasp the back of the left wrist.
Recite the body mantra seven times.

original: 欲進千里不以為難誦呪之時勿令聲出。
analyzed: 欲進千里不以為難誦呪之時勿令聲出。
translated: If you wish to travel a thousand miles, it will not be difficult. When reciting the mantra, do not let the sound come out.

original: 24 菩薩神變自在印菩薩神變自在印第二十四先以左手大母指捻小指甲上。
analyzed: 24 菩薩神變自在印菩薩神變自在印第二十四先以左手大母指捻小指甲上。
translated: 24. The Seal of Bodhisattva's Supernatural Powers and Freedom, the Twenty-fourth First, use the thumb of the left hand to pinch the tip of the little finger nail.
Next, do the same with the right hand.
The remaining three fingers are each spread out and erect.
The wrists are joined and placed on top of the head.
Recite the body mantra twenty-one times.

original: 皆得遊行自在昔有罽賓國僧闍提於北天竺求得此梵本未曾翻譯自得受持威力廣大不敢流傳智通於此僧弟婆伽邊得本依法受持功効不少唯不流行於世此本絕無後同學得者願同功德。
analyzed: 皆得遊行自在昔有罽賓國僧闍提於北天竺求得此梵本未曾翻譯自得受持威力廣大不敢流傳智通於此僧弟婆伽邊得本依法受持功効不少唯不流行於世此本絕無後同學得者願同功德。
translated: All will be able to roam freely. In the past, a monk from Kāśmīra named Jāti obtained this Sanskrit text in northern India. It had never been translated. He himself received and upheld it. Its power was vast, and he did not dare spread it. Zhìtōng obtained the text from the younger brother of this monk, Bā-jiā. He received and upheld it according to the method. Its efficacy was not small, but it was not widely circulated in the world. This text is absolutely without any later students who have obtained it. May they share in the merit.

original: 25 請千臂觀音菩薩心王印咒請千臂觀音菩薩心王印呪第二十五兩手合掌虛掌內合腕。
analyzed: 25 請千臂觀音菩薩心王印咒請千臂觀音菩薩心王印呪第二十五兩手合掌虛掌內合腕。
translated: Inviting the Thousand-Armed Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva's Heart King Seal and Mantra, the Twenty-fifth Join the palms together, with the wrists and palms hollow and empty.

original: 二頭指來去呪曰此印是第一根本啟請印。
analyzed: 二頭指來去呪曰此印是第一根本啟請印。
translated: The two index fingers move back and forth, with the mantra: This mudra is the first fundamental invocation mudra.

original: 唵阿嚕力帝麗路迦去夜毘社時賀耶薩婆鑠覩嚧二合鉢羅二合麼馱那迦羅耶𤙖泮莎訶爾時觀世音菩薩。
analyzed: 唵阿嚕力帝麗路迦去夜毘社時賀耶薩婆鑠覩嚧二合鉢羅二合麼馱那迦羅耶𤙖泮莎訶爾時觀世音菩薩。
translated: Oṃ ārulikte rucāye viśe śaye sarva śodhani pṛthivī dhārake hūṃ phaṭ svāhā At that time, Bodhisattva Avalokitêśvara,

original: 聞佛說已歡喜信受作禮而退。🔽千眼千臂觀世音菩薩陀羅尼神呪經卷下􄖩􄗭􄙺
analyzed: 聞佛說已歡喜信受作禮而退。 千眼千臂觀世音菩薩陀羅尼神呪經卷下􄖩􄗭􄙺
translated: having heard the Buddha's words, joyfully accepted them with faith, paid homage, and withdrew.🔽Thousand-Eyed and Thousand-Armed Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva Dhāraṇī Sūtra, Scroll 2
Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ
